results.content: So far, it's been a friendly introduction.
results.content_html: So far, it's been a friendly introduction.

results.content: Thanks for providing us free course.

Though the descriptions were very complete there is no direct, real-world, project that is completed as part of the course. A small project (create a form, selection list, etc.) to allow the students to apply the information. Even a reference to another video where you have a project would allow students to apply the basics that you provide in this video.
All information is very detailed and well explained. You do learn what each thing is.
